Title: HalloVeen
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Daniel J. Goor, Carly Hallam (story editor), Jessica Polonsky (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: The Nine-Nine has their fifth annual Halloween heist, and everyone has until midnight to claim the title of "Amazing Human/Genius".
